subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Joseph Ngwenya scored twice to lead the Houston Dynamo to a 4-0 victory against the visiting Red Bulls last night. Houston (8-5-2) is unbeaten in seven games since a 2-1 loss at D.C. United on May 26. The Red Bulls (6-5-3) lost for the third time in four games.
